citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
No responsible adult was available to accompany APHIS Officials for inspection at 1:30pm on 21 SEP 2020. The owner
was contacted by phone and stated no representative would be available for inspection within an hour of contact.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
No responsible adult was available to accompany APHIS Officials for inspection at 1:30pm on 21 SEP 2020. The owner 
was contacted by phone and stated no representative would be available for inspection within an hour of contact. 
 
 
 
End Section
